title: Update Hero section logo with uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre image

requirements.summary: Replace the current logo in the Hero component with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo image showing lightbulb design with yellow student figure and gold/yellow text on dark background with maroon border
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero component displays the uploaded logo image
The logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
The logo is visually consistent with the existing gold/yellow and maroon branding
The logo is appropriately sized for both desktop and mobile viewports

file_operations.description: Update the Hero component to reference the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/brilliant-logo.dim_512x512.jpg instead of the current logo. Ensure the image element uses proper responsive sizing classes and maintains aspect ratio for both desktop and mobile viewports. Add appropriate alt text describing the logo.

requirements.summary: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and ensure proper asset path reference
acceptanceCriteria: The logo file is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
The Hero component references the correct asset path
The image loads correctly when the application runs
No broken image links or 404 errors occur

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo (Brilliant Coaching Centre copy (1).jpg) as a static asset with standardized naming convention. The file shows a circular logo with maroon border, dark background, lightbulb design containing a yellow student figure with 'BRILLIANT' text bubble, and gold/yellow text reading 'brilliant COACHING CENTRE' below.
